name: Duncan & The Wisp
description:
This is my final project while studying at Full Sail University that started development in January 2019 and continued development until graduation of May 2019. Over the duration of 4 months, my team of five other classmates designed a Top Down Adventure game from scratch.

View more at my portfolio site: http://www.roybennettiv.com

DOWNLOAD & PLAY INSTRUCTIONS

  • After downloading the ZIP file, extract the "Ducan & The Wisp" folder somewhere locally onto your computer.
  • Launch the "Duncan & The Wisp.exe" file
  • Enjoy!

DISCLAIMER: This is a project completed by students. We ask that you please try to be forgiving toward any bugs you may encounter. We did the best we could within the time we were given and the skills we had at the time! We hope you still get to enjoy the game as a whole despite it's flaws. Thanks for checking it out!
